description: Gets the data portal URL for the specified Amazon DataZone domain.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: the ID of the Amazon DataZone domain the data portal of which you want to get.

nested_items.name: authCodeUrl
nested_items.description: The data portal URL of the specified Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: userProfileId
nested_items.description: The ID of the user profile.
